abstract: Siri, a virtual personal assistant, could help the iPhone 4S gain traction among consumers whose attention might otherwise drift to a Google-powered phone.
snippet: Siri, a virtual personal assistant, could help the iPhone 4S gain traction among consumers whose attention might otherwise drift to a Google-powered phone.
lead_paragraph: Do you remember the first time you saw the iPhone?

headline.main: Will Siri Bring Back the iPhone's Wow Factor?
